sentence.Network_en: The gaffer said he'd been fined for not doing the contract on time.
sentence.Network_cn: 工头说他因为没有按时履行合同而被罚款。

sentence.Network_en: I don't know what the gaffer will do if I'm late.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果我迟到了,不知道教练会怎么样.

sentence.Network_en: Nobody out there but some old gaffer with a cane.
sentence.Network_cn: 外面没别的人,就只有一个拄着拐棍的乡下老头.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 口译中遇到中文称谓如何翻译 ... 村长 village head 领班 captain；foreman；gaffer 经纪人 broker.
为保护受害人隐私，“儿童保护委员会”在报告中没有公开他的姓名和身份。只知道这名父亲称自己为“老头子”（gaffer）。
断焦用单反拍微电影之拍摄篇 | 点点微电影 ... 摄影指导（ Cinematographer） 灯光师（ Gaffer） 机械师（ Key Grip）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. : probably a contraction of godfather; compare with gammer

entry.def: People use gaffer to refer to the person in charge of the workers at a place of work such as a factory.

example.ex: The gaffer said he'd been fined for not doing the contract on time.
example.tran: 工头说他因为没有按时履行合同而被罚款。

means.word_mean: 2. an electrician responsible for lighting on a movie or tv set
3. a person who exercises control over workers;

sentences.sentence: "if you want to leave early you have to ask the foreman"

auth_sentence.content: I'll miss everyone there, especially the gaffer.

auth_sentence.content: You have marred my ramble, Gaffer Glover.
